security: Disclosing an individual's security clearance status could expose them to potential targeting or compromise. As the document states, 'RETURN TO CA* *Background Use Only* *â€¢ Do Not Reproduce*', indicating the sensitive nature of the information.
summary: A memorandum requesting security certification for Charlotte Z. Bustos-Videla for a PCS (Permanent Change of Station) or TDY (Temporary Duty) assignment to Fort of Spain.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a secret memorandum from James L. Franklin, Chief of the Official Cover Branch, to the Chief of the OS/Clearance Division, requesting the preparation of a security certification for Charlotte Z. Bustos-Videla, born on January 12, 1929, in Dayton, Ohio. The memo indicates that Bustos-Videla is scheduled for either a Permanent Change of Station (PCS) or a Temporary Duty (TDY) assignment to Fort of Spain from June 16-28, with the security certification to be addressed to Chief, CCS/OCB/State.
title: Certification of Security Clearance for CHARLOTTE Z. BUSTOS-VIDELA
sender: James L. Franklin, Chief, Official Cover Branch
